item.description:
Hi all,

Since it's rather difficult to coordinate via email re:French Movie Festival at the MFA, I am scheduling a couple of meetups for movies I can commit going to.

The first one is actually the last one of the series: "J?aurai voulu etre un danseur"

http://www.mfa.org/ca...

Please purchase your ticket online.

We can meet at 7:00pm in front of the Museum Store - inside, right across from the ticket booth where you will pick up your ticket. FYI, these movies usually sell out so the sooner you get your ticket, the better...

We can go somewhere for drinks afterwards. There is no place within walking distance - my usual pick is Brasserie Joe by the Copley Mall but we'll have to drive there.

If anyone has other suggestions - I'm open.

Cheers! Lorelei
item.how_to_find_us: TBD... I have to think about it :)

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: MFA French festival - Closing Night Movie and Apres-Movie drinks
